channel.title: Statues xp
channel.description: what file on my private server would i need to go into,so i can make my statues give me and other people higher xp.

item.title: Statues xp
item.dc:creator: @slay_blad3 slay blad3
item.description:
@slay_blad3 wrote:

Does the statue have an object ID when you right click?
If so post ObjID,ObjX,ObjY here.

Ok well anyway this is the basic xp from object format:

Search case 823:
and add this below or above it:

case ####: //object ID		
if (actionTimer == 0) {
setAnimation(0x326); //Animation used when clicked
addSkillXP((600*playerLevel[0]), 0); //xp amount to which skill
addSkillXP((300*playerLevel[3]), 3);
addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[18]), 18);
actionTimer = 12; //resets the animation timer
}
break;

Read full topic
